Reviews.Title: ok product
Reviews.Author: jrob
Reviews.Content: the camera with lens is amazing the filters are also good brand but the slr bag u get with it is crap its flimsy has no seperation pockets or pockets at all doesnt zip or anything i had to buy another bag because it wouldnt even stand on its own with my camera in it i had nowhere to put my little things and the cleaning kit is also cheap i would pay the extra to get a better product if your paying this much for a camera why would you want cheap stuff to store and clean it with...not worth the money. o yea and i didnt even get the camera card that was supposed to come with it

ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 DX-format Digital SLR Kit w/ 18-55mm DX VR Zoom Lens Pro Kit (Red)
